#summary The built-in feature set.

= Executive Summary =

*playwith* tries to work out the structure of a plot, in order to interact with it. The built-in features include: navigating the data space, identifying and brushing data points, editing and annotating the plot, and saving to a file. Interactive controls for parameters (sliders, spinbuttons, combo-boxes, etc) can be generated automatically. New tools can be defined.
